short_summary: Purchase eight (8) Electric Forklift and ancillary items
description: he Department of National Defense has a requirement to purchase eight (8) Electric Forklift and ancillary items, as described in Annex A – Pricing, and Annex B – Requirement, and in accordance with Supply Arrangement E60HS-21FRK/HS, Group 6A, Configuration B.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

**Reference Number**: CB-745-6282587

**Solicitation Number**: W8476-236678/B

**Publication Date**: June 11, 2024

**Tender Closing Date**: July 18, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

### Project Overview

The Department of National Defense (DND) is seeking a supplier to provide eight (8) electric forklifts and ancillary items. The requirement is governed by Supply Arrangement E60HS-21FRK/HS, Group 6A, Configuration B.

### Bid Solicitation Requirements

*   This bid solicitation process is only open to suppliers holding a valid Supply Arrangement under Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HS-21FRKL/HS, Group 6A.
*   Suppliers are encouraged to become pre-qualified for a SA by visiting [CanadaBuys.gc.ca](http://CanadaBuys.gc.ca).
*   The contract is expected to be awarded to the lowest bidder.
*   The requested delivery date is 180 days after the contract award date.

### Tender Terms and Conditions

*   The contract will be awarded through a competitive, selective tendering process.
*   The successful bidder will be required to meet all the requirements outlined in the bid solicitation package.
*   The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

### Documents and Attachments

The bid solicitation package, including the amendment, is available for download from [CanadaBuys.gc.ca](http://CanadaBuys.gc.ca).

### Contact Information

Lidija Al Brich
DLP 5-3-4-4
Lidija.Albrich@forces.gc.ca

### Language

The bid solicitation and all communication related to this project will be conducted in both English and French.
